data.system_settings: Dell i5 Notebook, Windows 10.1 Home Edition
data.client_settings: Release Channel: canary, Build Number: 7502, Version Hash: 853b0be25dd5c703b56a814367e6b3f7f027c53a
data.actual_result: Old profile doesnt update to the new one and it is considered as another user instead of the same user
data.expected_result: Old profile should update to the new profile and/or old profile still be detected as the user itself
data.short_description: You appear to be able to DM yourself after a name change
data.steps_to_repro: - Send a message in a public server and make sure its not deleted and dont get it out of sight, you will need it later - Change your Discord username (USERNAME not nickname!) - Go back to the channel where you sent the message in Step 1 and send another message - Click your name in the message sent in Step 3, it should show you the regular profile youre already used to see when you click your own profile (Notice it has no "Message @user" box) - Now close that and click your name in the message sent in Step 1, it should show your old profile with your old username, and it will consider that it is another account instead of you, note it DOES have the "Message @user" box at the bottom now
